QuestData.Title: Growing the Farm I: The Weeds
QuestData.Description: Hey $n, I've been thinkin' recently about expanding my farm.$B$BSee that plot there that's just covered in weeds? If we can get rid of those weeds, we could use that land for planting.$B$BI heard there's a farmer by the name of Gai Lan who knows a thing or two about weed whackin'.$B$BHis farm is just out west. Go talk to him and see if he'd be willing to help us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Gai Lan at The Heartland in the Valley of the Four Winds.
